## Checklist
- [ ] I have read the [Implementation Doctrine](../IMPLEMENTATION_DOCTRINE.md)
- [ ] Tests added (unit + integration)
- [ ] SQL migrations added (if DB changes)
- [ ] Event log schemas updated (if relevant)
- [ ] RLS policies updated (if writable columns added)
- [ ] CI passes (lint, build, tests)
